courseName: Community Health Studies, Specialist Practice Award in District Nursing MSc / PGDip
facultyName: School of Health and Social Care
description: Community Health Studies, Specialist Practice Award in District Nursing Course OverviewThe MSc in Community Health Studies, Specialist Practice Award in District Nursing aims to prepare district nurses to work independently and autonomously in a complex, rapidly changing environment; our aim is to help you become inspirational leaders of the future, transforming practice, contributing to the wider health care agenda.As a result of this Master's Degree in Community Health Studies, Specialist Practice Award in District Nursing you will be able to:
duration: MSc 1 year full-time, 2 years part-time; PGDip 1 year full-time, 2 years part-time
fees: FeesPlease visit our website for the Community Health Studies, Specialist Practice Award in District Nursing course fee information.
